## AvatarOptions.firstPersonOnlyLayer property

[Layer number](https://threejs.org/docs/#api/en/core/Layers) to be displayed only for first-person camera. (Layer numbers that you do not want displayed on mirrors, etc.)

**Signature:**

```typescript
firstPersonOnlyLayer?: number;
```
